+ echo -n start time:
+ date +%T.%3N
+ ######BIN_PATH###### timeout 10 sh -xc trap 'echo start_trap; echo end_trap' TERM; echo 'trap installed, start sleep'; sleep 30; echo 'sleep done'
+ trap echo start_trap; echo end_trap TERM
+ echo trap installed, start sleep
+ sleep 30
Terminated
+ echo start_trap
+ echo end_trap
+ echo sleep done
+ exit_code=124
+ echo -n after timeout time:
+ date +%T.%3N
+ sleep 5
+ echo -n after outer sleep 5 time:
+ date +%T.%3N
+ exit 124
